content: I am currently a PhD candidate at UT Austin, advised by Rachel Ward. My research focuses on understanding optimization and generalization in deep learning. In particular, I am interested in adaptive stochastic gradient descent algorithms, generalization of overparameterized systems, sparse random feature models, and robust learning. Before joining UT Austin, I received my bachelor’s degree in Mathematics and Applied Mathematics from Zhejiang University.

title: Yuege (Gail) Xie
